CustomField.description: Derived field based upon the value set in "Confidence in Completion Date" field.
CustomField.formula: IF (IsClosed = True, "1 Closed", IF(ISPICKVAL(PSCase_Confidence_in_Completion__c, "High") , "2 Commit", IF(ISPICKVAL(PSCase_Confidence_in_Completion__c, "Low"), "3 Best Case", "4 N/A")))
CustomField.label: Forecast Category
